msg: Fixed previous check-in. Asynchronous behaviour required blocking while loop.

msg: Created task for unit testing under Rhino.

msg: Added some experiments for using Rhino's built-in load() function in Ant script contexts, as well as importing RequireJS modules.

author: jbeard
msg: Slight refactoring. Moved the property generation into a single central area. This allowed the removal of the dependency between generate-unit-tests-html task and generate-javascript task.

msg: build.xml now generates unit test html files which work correctly.
